Hey all.

 

Sorry if it's a known one. It's certainly new to me.

 

First how to get the glitch:

Select the Cabriolet cutaway option by the leftmost crew member monitor screen thing at the bottom right.

Push "C" to get a Cabin View.

Push "V" to change said cabin view.

Push "C" to get back to an outside view.

Now the glitch.

When you switch to map and back the cutaway remains.

You can select it off but you go map and back it's back. Won't go away again.

 

It seems to follow crew members. As you transfer them from cockpit to cockpit in a stack of cockpits.

 

Thanks.

 

Good game,

 

ME

As per

information about your KSP version and which mods are installed would be helpful as well.

Sounds like a bug, alrighty. And so, the thread has been moved to the support subforum.
